attributes.action: Make Angus McCann mains electricity & 12v battery safety representative to the HSE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Angus can make a real difference in our society by avoiding all the accidental injuries caused by untrained and unskilled poeple touching mains electricity and 12v batteries in their intruder alarm control panel. Once in power Angus would start on a nationwide door-2-door campaign educating the citizens of the United Kingdom. Please sign this petition as a 1st step to saving the public from the dangers of mains electricity and 12v batteries.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
